list-view-config.query-construct:
PREFIX core: <http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX bibo: <http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX vitro: <http://vitro.mannlib.cornell.edu/ns/vitro/0.7#> PREFIX uowvivo: <http://uowvivo.uow.edu.au/ontology/uowvivo#> CONSTRUCT { ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:hideFromDisplay ?hideThis . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource a <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/IAO_0000030> . ?infoResource vitro:mostSpecificType ?subclass . ?infoResource rdfs:label ?infoResourceName . ?infoResource bibo:volume ?volume . ?infoResource bibo:pageStart ?startPage . ?infoResource bibo:pageEnd ?endPage . ?infoResource core:placeOfPublication ?locale . ?infoResource bibo:reproducedIn ?appearsInObj . ?appearsInObj rdfs:label ?appearsIn .
?infoResource core:publisher ?publisher . #?publisherObj rdfs:label ?publisher .
?infoResource core:hasPublicationVenue ?publishedIn . ?publishedIn rdfs:label ?journal .
?infoResource core:dateTimeValue ?dateTimeValue . ?dateTimeValue core:dateTime ?dateTime .
?infoResource <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/BFO_0000050> ?partOfObj . ?partOfObj rdfs:label ?partOf .
?infoResource core:relatedBy ?editorship . ?editorship a core:Editorship . ?editorship core:relates ?editorObj . ?editorObj a foaf:Person . ?editorObj rdfs:label ?editor . ?infoResource uowvivo:bookTitle ?bookTitle . ?infoResource uowvivo:coursewareVersion ?coursewareVersion . ?infoResource uowvivo:dateOfExhibition ?dateOfExhibition . ?infoResource uowvivo:ismn ?ismn . ?infoResource uowvivo:dateOfAdvertisement ?dateOfAd . ?infoResource uowvivo:placeOfAdvertisement ?placeOfAd . ?infoResource uowvivo:dateFirstPerformed ?dateFirstPerformed . ?infoResource uowvivo:lengthOfPerformance ?lengthOfPerformance . ?infoResource uowvivo:dateOfRecording ?dateOfRecording . ?infoResource uowvivo:url ?url . ?infoResource uowvivo:venue ?venue . ?infoResource uowvivo:dateOfPresentation ?dateOfPresentation . ?infoResource bibo:edition ?edition . ?infoResource bibo:issue ?issue . ?infoResource bibo:numPages ?numPages . ?infoResource bibo:isbn10 ?isbn10 . ?infoResource bibo:isbn13 ?isbn13 . ?infoResource bibo:presentedAt ?conferenceTitle . ?infoResource bibo:locator ?conferenceLocat . ?infoResource core:hasPublicationVenue ?publishedIn . ?infoResource core:patentNumber ?patentNumber . ?publishedIn bibo:issn ?issn . ?infoResource bibo:doi ?doi } WHERE { { ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship } UNION { ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:hideFromDisplay ?hideThis . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource a <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/IAO_0000030> . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource a <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/IAO_0000030> . ?infoResource vitro:mostSpecificType ?subclass . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource a <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/IAO_0000030> . ?infoResource rdfs:label ?infoResourceName } UNION { ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource a <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/IAO_0000030> . ?infoResource bibo:volume ?volume . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource a <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/IAO_0000030> . ?infoResource bibo:pageStart ?startPage . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource a <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/IAO_0000030> . ?infoResource bibo:pageEnd ?endPage . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource a <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/IAO_0000030> . ?infoResource core:placeOfPublication ?locale . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource a <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/IAO_0000030> . ?infoResource bibo:reproducedIn ?appearsInObj . ?appearsInObj rdfs:label ?appearsIn . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource a <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/IAO_0000030> . ?infoResource core:publisher ?publisher . #?publisherObj rdfs:label ?publisher . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource a <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/IAO_0000030> . ?infoResource core:dateTimeValue ?dateTimeValue . ?dateTimeValue core:dateTime ?dateTime . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource a <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/IAO_0000030> . ?infoResource core:hasPublicationVenue ?publishedIn . ?publishedIn rdfs:label ?journal . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource a <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/IAO_0000030> . ?infoResource <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/BFO_0000050> ?partOfObj . ?partOfObj rdfs:label ?partOf . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource a bibo:Book . ?infoResource core:relatedBy ?editorship . ?editorship a core:Editorship . ?editorship core:relates ?editorObj . ?editorObj a foaf:Person . ?editorObj rdfs:label ?editor . } UNION { ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource a bibo:BookSection . ?infoResource core:relatedBy ?editorship . ?editorship a core:Editorship . ?editorship core:relates ?editorObj . ?editorObj a foaf:Person . ?editorObj rdfs:label ?editor . } UNION{ ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource core:hasPublicationVenue ?publishedIn . ?publishedIn bibo:issn ?issn } UNION{ ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource uowvivo:bookTitle ?bookTitle } UNION{ ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource uowvivo:coursewareVersion ?coursewareVersion } UNION{ ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource uowvivo:dateOfExhibition ?dateOfExhibition } UNION{ ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource uowvivo:ismn ?ismn } UNION{ ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource uowvivo:dateOfAdvertisement ?dateOfAd } UNION{ ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource uowvivo:placeOfAdvertisement ?placeOfAd } UNION{ ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource uowvivo:dateFirstPerformed ?dateFirstPerformed } UNION{ ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource uowvivo:lengthOfPerformance ?lengthOfPerformance } UNION{ ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource uowvivo:dateOfRecording ?dateOfRecording } UNION{ ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource uowvivo:url ?url } UNION{ ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource bibo:edition ?edition } UNION{ ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource bibo:issue ?issue } UNION{ ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource bibo:numPages ?numPages } UNION{ ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource bibo:isbn10 ?isbn10 } UNION{ ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource bibo:isbn13 ?isbn13 } UNION{ ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource uowvivo:venue ?venue } UNION{ ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource bibo:presentedAt ?conferenceTitle } UNION{ ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource bibo:locator ?conferenceLocat } UNION{ ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource uowvivo:dateOfPresentation ?dateOfPresentation } UNION{ ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource core:patentNumber ?patentNumber } UNION{ ?subject ?property ?authorship . ?authorship a core:Authorship . ?authorship core:relates ?infoResource . ?infoResource bibo:doi ?doi } }
